paragraphs: o   Bring water and salt to a boil.
o   Reduce heat and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened (about 30 minutes).

paragraphs: o   Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o   Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture.
o   Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o   Divide dough into pieces and roll into ropes, then shape into pretzels.
o   Boil water with baking soda and dip pretzels in the solution.
o   Place on a baking sheet, brush with beaten egg, and sprinkle with coarse salt.
o   Bake at 450F (230C) for 12-15 minutes until golden.
sentences: Ingredients : o   2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast o   1 teaspoon sugar o   1 cup warm water o   3 cups flour o   1 teaspoon salt o   1/4 cup baking soda o   1 egg o   Coarse salt Instructions : o   Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o   Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture.
o   Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o   Divide dough into pieces and roll into ropes, then shape into pretzels.
o   Boil water with baking soda and dip pretzels in the solution.
o   Place on a baking sheet, brush with beaten egg, and sprinkle with coarse salt.
o   Bake at 450F (230C) for 12-15 minutes until golden.
o   Serve warm.
